answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat

answers.answer: Yes, we applied to GG22 OSS with this same profile and project. Also, to Web3 Infrastructure in April 2024.
answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile to prior rounds.

answers.answer: MigaLabs, has developed the network crawler that provides data about client diversity to the community. We also worked on Blockprint, which also helps client diversity. We also developed the GotEth dta indexer, which many groups use to track the performance of their validators. We also developed EthSeer, a free block explorer for the community.
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer: We provide multiple public and free dashboards for the community to keep informed about the status of the network and the chain.
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer: We provide OSS for tracking validators' performance, block explorers, client diversity, the geographical distribution of nodes, and network conditions, among many others.
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer: We will use the funds to cover hardware infrastructure to keep the dashboards alive and to keep improving the data that we provide to the public.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer: We contribute to the decentralization of Ethereum by providing free data about client diversity, geographical node distribution, and entity staking. We contribute to the security by providing alternative OSS for indexing and verifying the data that is offered by close source block explorers like etherscan.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: MigaLabs
project.description:
We are a research group specialized in next-generation Blockchain technology. We focus on in-depth studies and solutions for Blockchain Scalability, Security, and Sustainability. Our team comprises technical experts in the Ethereum protocol, offering consulting services covering all technical aspects of Blockchain technology.

We have developed a block explorer and a network dashboard for the community.
* https://ethseer.io/?network=mainnet
* https://monitoreth.io/

We have also produced multiple open-source tools for the Ethereum infrastructure.

* https://github.com/migalabs/goteth
* https://github.com/migalabs/armiarma
* https://github.com/migalabs/eth-pokhar
